name: @boyeborg/crown
description: Ensures the youngest (newest) monarch (version) within kingdoms (packages) holds the royal office (is taggeed as latest).
author: Boye Borg

scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm publish --access public && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm publish --access public && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm publish --access public && git push --follow-tags
